titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Moldova
Moldova

div.head: Legislation
div.p: Moldova has a Law on Access to Information. Researchers should inquire at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs for access to diplomatic records. Diplomatic archives for pre-independence may be found in Moscow, Russia or Bucharest, Romania depending on time period.

div.head: Location
div.p: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and European Integration: 80, 31 August str., Chisinau MD2012, Republic of Moldova.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should contact the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to discover the location of relevant records.
